data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 and 47 of SEBI (LODR) Regulations 2015 enclosed are the copies of Newspaper Advertisements pertaining to publication of Financial Results for the Quarter and Nine months ended on 31st December 2025 as approved by Board in its meeting held on 4th February 2026.

data.news_body: Jaiprakash Power Ventures Ltdhas informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 04/02/2026 inter alia to consider and approve the Un-audited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results of the Company for the Quarter and Nine Months ended 31st December 2025.

data.caption: Continual Disclosure Under Regulation 30 Of SEBI(LODR) Regulations 2015 - Release Of Shri Manoj Gaur NED And Chairman Of The Company On Interim Bail.
data.news_body: Continual Disclosure under Regulation 30 of SEBI (LODR) Regulations 2015 in continuation with previous disclosure dated 13th November 2025 about ED action in connection of ongoing investigation in respect of Jaypee Infratech Ltd and Jaiprakash Associates Limited that Shri Manoj Gaur Non Executive Director and Chairman of the Company has been released on interim bail vide Addl Session Judge - 7 Patiala House Court order dated 24th Jan. 2026.

data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 of SEBI (LODR) Regulations 2015 this is inform you that CRISIL Ratings Limited as assigned its rating.

data.caption: Frauds-Initial Disclosure
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 of SEBI (LODR) Regulation 2015 disclosure is given that Shri Manoj Gaur Non Executive Chairman of the Company has been arrested by ED under some provisions of PMLA 2002 in respect of offence not related to the Company but related to Jaypee Infratech Ltd acquired By Suraksha Reality Ltd under IBC vide order dated 7.3.2023 and Jaiprakash Associates Limited which is undergoing CIRP Process since 3.6.2024.

data.caption: Clarification sought from Jaiprakash Power Ventures Ltd
data.news_body:
The Exchange has sought clarification from Jaiprakash Power Ventures Ltd on July 15 2025 with reference to significant movement in price in order to ensure that investors have latest relevant information about the company and to inform the market so that the interest of the investors is safeguarded.

The reply is awaited.

data.caption: Closure of Trading Window
data.news_body: Pursuant to SEBI (PIT) Regulations, 2015, this is to inform that the Trading Window shall remain closed w.e.f. 1st July, 2024 for the purpose of Consideration and Approval of Un-audited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results for the Quarter ended on 30th June, 2024.

data.caption: Shareholder Meeting / Postal Ballot-Scrutinizers Report
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 44(3) of the SEBI (LODR) Regulations, 2015, please find enclosed herewith the Result of remote e-voting of Postal Ballot along with Scrutinizer''s Report for the Resolutions proposed for approval of members through Notice of Postal Ballot dated 27th April, 2024.

data.caption: Clarification On Corporate Announcement Dated 3Rd June, 2024
data.news_body: In response to queries from shareholders about Corporate Announcement dated 3rd June 2024 intimating about admission of Jaiprakash Associates Ltd. (The Promoter Company) in CIRP under IBC  2016, it is clarified that the disclosure was given in compliance of SEBI (LODR) Regulation 2015 and that Jaiprakash Power Ventures Limited is a separate legal entity managed by a separate Board of Directors and team of executives. The plants are operating smoothly at optimum capacity. Because of the above development, there is no impact on the operational performance and financial well being of the Company.

data.caption: Announcement Under Regulation 30 Of SEBI (LODR) Regulation, 2015 About Admission Of Jaiprakash Associates Ltd. , The Promoter Company, Under Corporate Insolvency Resolution Process (CIRP)
data.news_body: This is to inform pursuant to Regulation 30 of SEBI (LODR) Regulation 2015 that Jaiprakash Associates Limited, the promoter company, has been admitted today under Corporate Insolvency Resolution Process under section 7 of IBC Code 2016 by an order verbally pronounced today by Hon''ble NCLT, Allahabad Bench.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Newspaper Publication
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 and 47 of SEBI (LODR) Regulations, 2015, please find enclosed herewith copies of Newspaper Advertisements published on 18th May, 2024 pertaining to Postal Ballot Notice dated 27th April, 2024 and information on remote e-voting.

data.caption: Shareholder Meeting / Postal Ballot-Notice of Postal Ballot
data.news_body: Intimation of Postal Ballot Notice dated 27th April, 2024 pursuant to Regulation 30 of the SEBI (LODR) Regulations, 2015. The e Voting will commence on Saturday, 18th May, 2024 from 9:00 AM and will end on Sunday, 16th June, 2024 at 5:00 PM. The Result will be declared on Monday, 17th June, 2024.

data.caption: Audited Standalone And Consolidated Financial Results Of The Company For The Quarter And Year Ended 31St March, 2023
data.news_body:
In terms of Clause 33(3)(d) of Securities & Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, please find enclosed herewith the Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results of the Company for the quarter and year ended 31st March, 2023, as approved by the Board of Directors of the Company in its meeting held on 9th May, 2023, alongwith Reports of Statutory Auditors - M/s. Lodha & Company, Chartered Accountants, New Delhi.

Further, we would like to state that Statutory Auditors of the Company have issued Audit Reports with modified opinion on both the Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results. Accordingly, in terms of Regulation 30/33 of SEBI (LODR) Regulations, 2015, a Statement on Impact of Audit Qualifications is also enclosed.
The meeting commenced at 3.30 P.M. and concluded at 7.10 P.M.

data.caption: Outcome Of The Board Meeting Pursuant To Regulation 30 & 33 Of SEBI (LODR) Regulations, 2015
data.news_body:
1. Financial Results
The unaudited Financial Results (Standalone and Consolidated) ('Results') for the quarter and nine months ended on 31.12.2022 together with the Limited Review Report (LRR) of the Statutory Auditors thereon, pursuant to Regulation 33 of the Listing Regulations is attached herewith.

2. Update on Divestment of 2 MTPA Jaypee Nigrie Cement Grinding Unit (CGU)
This is further to our intimation dated 13.12.2022, regarding entering into framework agreement dated 12.12.2022, for divestment of CGU (Non core asset) with Dalmia Cement (Bharat) Limited (DCBL), the Board, on the recommendations of Audit Committee and as per mutual understanding between the Company and DCBL, have decided to enter into a Tolling / Lease agreement (on mutually agreed terms) for a period of upto Seven (7) years for the time being, instead of transfer by sale and M/s DCBL shall have right to purchase the CGU from JPVL on or before the 7th year at an Enterprise Value of Rs. 250.00 Crore.

data.caption: Audited Standalone And Consolidated Financial Results Of The Company For The Quarter And Year Ended 31St March, 2022,  Reports Of Statutory Auditors And Statement On Impact Of Audit Qualifications Under Regulation 30/33 Of The Securities And Exchange Board Of India (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 ('LODR Regulations')
data.news_body:
Please find enclosed herewith the Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results of the Company for the quarter and year ended 31st March, 2022, as approved by the Board of Directors of the Company in its meeting held on 27th May, 2022, alongwith Reports of Statutory Auditors - M/s. Lodha & Company, Chartered Accountants, New Delhi.

Further, we would like to state that Statutory Auditors of the Company have issued Audit Reports with modified opinion on both the Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results. Accordingly, in terms of Regulation 30/33 of SEBI (LODR) Regulations, 2015, a Statement on Impact of Audit Qualifications is also enclosed.

The meeting commenced at 4.00 P.M. and concluded at 6.30 P.M.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of The Board Meeting Held On 11Th February, 2022
data.news_body:
In the Board Meeting held today i.e. 11th February, 2022, the Board has approved, in terms of Regulation 33 (3)(d) of Securities & Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, the Unaudited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results of the Company for the Quarter and Nine Months ended 31st December, 2021. A copy of the same is enclosed alongwith Limited Review Report of Statutory Auditors, M/s. Lodha & Company, Chartered Accountants, New Delhi.

The Board took note of the voting rights, henceforth exercisable by (unlisted) Preference Shareholders (to whom the preference shares were allotted pursuant to the Debt Resolution Plan and consequent Framework Agreement executed on 18th April, 2019) in all general meetings by operation of Section 47 of the Companies Act, 2013.

data.caption: Declaration Of Unaudited Standalone And Consolidated Financial Results Of The Company For The Quarter And Half Year Ended 30Th September, 2021
data.news_body:
Please find the Un-audited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results for the quarter and half year ended 30th September, 2021 as required under Regulation 33(3) of Securities & Exchange Board of India (LODR)) Regulations, 2015 which have been reviewed by the Audit Committee and approved by the Board of Directors in their respective meetings held on 13th November, 2021.
Further, as required under Regulation 33(2)(c) of the Securities and Exchange Board of India (LODR) Regulations, 2015, also enclosed herewith a copy each of 'Limited Review Report' by the Statutory Auditors on the Un-audited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results of the Company for the quarter and half year ended 30th September, 2021. The 'Limited Review Report' has been placed before the Board of Directors in their meeting held on 13th November, 2021. The meeting commenced at 3.45 P.M. and concluded at 5.45 P.M.
